dataTemplate.name: ams
dataTemplate.dataQuery:
SELECT GTM_TRANSACTION.GTM_TRANSACTION_GID GTM_TRANSACTION_GID, GTM_TRANSACTION_XID, DATA_QUERY_TYPE_GID, OBJECT_ID, CARRIER_CODE, CONVEYANCE_NAME, CONVEYANCE_FLAG, GTM_TRANSACTION.TRANSPORT_MODE_GID TRANSPORT_MODE_GID, X12_FORMAT_CODE, INCO_TERM_GID, INCO_TERM_LOCATION, IS_HAZARDOUS_CARGO, (SELECT STATUS_VALUE_XID FROM GLOGOWNER.GTM_TRANS_REQD_STATUS, GLOGOWNER.STATUS_VALUE, GLOGOWNER.STATUS_TYPE WHERE GTM_TRANS_REQD_STATUS.GTM_TRANSACTION_GID = GTM_TRANSACTION.GTM_TRANSACTION_GID AND GTM_TRANS_REQD_STATUS.STATUS_TYPE_GID = STATUS_VALUE.STATUS_TYPE_GID AND GTM_TRANS_REQD_STATUS.STATUS_VALUE_GID = STATUS_VALUE.STATUS_VALUE_GID AND STATUS_VALUE.STATUS_TYPE_GID = STATUS_TYPE.STATUS_TYPE_GID AND DOCUMENT_DEF_GID = :P_DOCUMENT_DEF_GID AND STATUS_TYPE_XID = 'SHIPMENT_CUSTOMS_STATE') AS SHIPMENT_CUSTOMS_STATE, (SELECT STATUS_VALUE_XID FROM GLOGOWNER.GTM_TRANS_REQD_STATUS, GLOGOWNER.STATUS_VALUE, GLOGOWNER.STATUS_TYPE WHERE GTM_TRANS_REQD_STATUS.GTM_TRANSACTION_GID = GTM_TRANSACTION.GTM_TRANSACTION_GID AND GTM_TRANS_REQD_STATUS.STATUS_TYPE_GID = STATUS_VALUE.STATUS_TYPE_GID AND GTM_TRANS_REQD_STATUS.STATUS_VALUE_GID = STATUS_VALUE.STATUS_VALUE_GID AND STATUS_VALUE.STATUS_TYPE_GID = STATUS_TYPE.STATUS_TYPE_GID AND DOCUMENT_DEF_GID = :P_DOCUMENT_DEF_GID AND STATUS_TYPE_XID = 'CUSTOMS_FILING') AS CUSTOMS_FILING_STATUS, (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMM') FROM DUAL) as INTERCHANGE_DATE , (SELECT REFNUM_VALUE FROM GLOGOWNER.GTM_TRANS_REFNUM GTR WHERE GTR.GTM_TRANSACTION_GID = GTM_TRANSACTION.GTM_TRANSACTION_GID AND GTM_TRANS_REFNUM_QUAL_GID = :P_REPORTING_REFERENCE_NUMBER) REPORTING_REFERENCE_NUMBER FROM GLOGOWNER.GTM_TRANSACTION LEFT OUTER JOIN GLOGOWNER.TRANSPORT_MODE ON (GTM_TRANSACTION.TRANSPORT_MODE_GID = TRANSPORT_MODE.TRANSPORT_MODE_GID) WHERE GTM_TRANSACTION.GTM_TRANSACTION_GID = :P_GTM_CUSTOMS_ID
SELECT GTIP.INVOLVED_PARTY_QUAL_GID INVOLVED_PARTY_QUAL_GID, INVOLVED_PARTY_CONTACT_GID, CONTACT_XID, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, PHONE1, PHONE2, FAX, MIDDLE_NAME, CELL_PHONE, ALTERNATE_NAME, COMPANY_NAME, LOCATION.LOCATION_GID LOCATION_GID, LOCATION_XID, LOCATION_NAME, CITY, PROVINCE, PROVINCE_CODE, POSTAL_CODE, LOCATION.COUNTRY_CODE3_GID COUNTRY_CODE3_GID, COUNTRY_CODE3_XID, COUNTRY_CODE2, null as SCAC_GID, (SELECT REFNUM_VALUE FROM GLOGOWNER.GTM_PARTY_REFNUM GPR1 WHERE GPR1.CONTACT_GID = GTIP.INVOLVED_PARTY_CONTACT_GID AND GPR1.GTM_PARTY_REFNUM_QUAL_GID = 'DDTC REGISTRATION NUMBER') AS DDTC_REGISTRATION_NUMBER, (SELECT REMARK_TEXT FROM GLOGOWNER.GTM_PARTY_REMARK GPR2 WHERE GPR2.CONTACT_GID = GTIP.INVOLVED_PARTY_CONTACT_GID AND GPR2.REMARK_QUAL_GID = 'ELIGIBLE PARTY CERTIFICATION') AS ELIGIBLE_PARTY_CERTIFICATION, (SELECT REFNUM_VALUE FROM GLOGOWNER.GTM_PARTY_REFNUM GPR3 WHERE GPR3.CONTACT_GID = GTIP.INVOLVED_PARTY_CONTACT_GID AND GPR3.GTM_PARTY_REFNUM_QUAL_GID = 'ACID') AS ACID, (SELECT REFNUM_VALUE FROM GLOGOWNER.GTM_PARTY_REFNUM WHERE GTM_PARTY_REFNUM_QUAL_GID ='EIN' AND CONTACT_GID = CONTACT.CONTACT_GID) EIN, (SELECT REFNUM_VALUE FROM GLOGOWNER.GTM_PARTY_REFNUM WHERE GTM_PARTY_REFNUM_QUAL_GID ='DUNS' AND CONTACT_GID = CONTACT.CONTACT_GID) DUNS, (SELECT REFNUM_VALUE FROM GLOGOWNER.GTM_PARTY_REFNUM WHERE GTM_PARTY_REFNUM_QUAL_GID = :P_REPORTING_FOREIGN_ENTITY AND CONTACT_GID = CONTACT.CONTACT_GID) FOREIGN_ENTITY, (SELECT GTM_CODE FROM GLOGOWNER.GTM_PARTY_CODE WHERE GTM_TYPE_GID ='CONSIGNEE TYPE' AND CONTACT_GID = CONTACT.CONTACT_GID) UTLIMATE_CONSIGNEE_TYPE, LA1.ADDRESS_LINE AS ADDLINE1,LA2.ADDRESS_LINE AS ADDLINE2 FROM GLOGOWNER.GTM_TRANSACTION_INVOLVED_PARTY GTIP, GLOGOWNER.CONTACT LEFT OUTER JOIN GLOGOWNER.LOCATION ON (CONTACT.LOCATION_GID = LOCATION.LOCATION_GID) LEFT OUTER JOIN GLOGOWNER.COUNTRY_CODE ON (LOCATION.COUNTRY_CODE3_GID = COUNTRY_CODE.COUNTRY_CODE3_GID) LEFT OUTER JOIN LOCATION_ADDRESS LA1 ON (LA1.LOCATION_GID=LOCATION.LOCATION_GID AND LA1.LINE_SEQUENCE='1') LEFT OUTER JOIN LOCATION_ADDRESS LA2 ON (LA2.LOCATION_GID=LOCATION.LOCATION_GID AND LA2.LINE_SEQUENCE='2') WHERE GTIP.INVOLVED_PARTY_CONTACT_GID = CONTACT.CONTACT_GID AND GTIP.INVOLVED_PARTY_QUAL_GID IN ('CONSIGNEE', 'FORWARDING AGENT', 'INTERMEDIATE CONSIGNEE', 'USPPI') AND GTIP.GTM_TRANSACTION_GID = :P_GTM_CUSTOMS_ID AND ROWNUM <= 10 UNION SELECT GTIP.INVOLVED_PARTY_QUAL_GID INVOLVED_PARTY_QUAL_GID, INVOLVED_PARTY_CONTACT_GID, CONTACT_XID, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, PHONE1, PHONE2, FAX, MIDDLE_NAME, CELL_PHONE, ALTERNATE_NAME, COMPANY_NAME, LOCATION.LOCATION_GID LOCATION_GID, LOCATION_XID, LOCATION_NAME, CITY, PROVINCE, PROVINCE_CODE, POSTAL_CODE, LOCATION.COUNTRY_CODE3_GID COUNTRY_CODE3_GID, COUNTRY_CODE3_XID, COUNTRY_CODE2, null, null, null, null, null, null,null,null,null,null FROM GLOGOWNER.GTM_TRANSACTION_INVOLVED_PARTY GTIP, GLOGOWNER.CONTACT LEFT OUTER JOIN GLOGOWNER.LOCATION ON (CONTACT.LOCATION_GID = LOCATION.LOCATION_GID) LEFT OUTER JOIN GLOGOWNER.COUNTRY_CODE ON (LOCATION.COUNTRY_CODE3_GID = COUNTRY_CODE.COUNTRY_CODE3_GID) WHERE GTIP.INVOLVED_PARTY_CONTACT_GID = CONTACT.CONTACT_GID AND GTIP.INVOLVED_PARTY_QUAL_GID = 'SHIP_FROM' AND GTIP.GTM_TRANSACTION_GID = :P_GTM_CUSTOMS_ID UNION SELECT GTIP.INVOLVED_PARTY_QUAL_GID INVOLVED_PARTY_QUAL_GID, INVOLVED_PARTY_CONTACT_GID, CONTACT_XID, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, PHONE1, PHONE2, FAX, MIDDLE_NAME, CELL_PHONE, ALTERNATE_NAME, COMPANY_NAME, LOCATION.LOCATION_GID LOCATION_GID, LOCATION_XID, LOCATION_NAME, CITY, PROVINCE, PROVINCE_CODE, POSTAL_CODE, LOCATION.COUNTRY_CODE3_GID COUNTRY_CODE3_GID, COUNTRY_CODE3_XID, COUNTRY_CODE2,SERVPROV.SCAC_GID SCAC_GID, null, null, null, null, null,null,null,null,null FROM GLOGOWNER.GTM_TRANSACTION_INVOLVED_PARTY GTIP, GLOGOWNER.CONTACT LEFT OUTER JOIN GLOGOWNER.LOCATION ON (CONTACT.LOCATION_GID = LOCATION.LOCATION_GID) LEFT OUTER JOIN GLOGOWNER.COUNTRY_CODE ON (LOCATION.COUNTRY_CODE3_GID = COUNTRY_CODE.COUNTRY_CODE3_GID) LEFT OUTER JOIN GLOGOWNER.SERVPROV ON (CONTACT.CONTACT_GID = SERVPROV.SERVPROV_GID) WHERE GTIP.INVOLVED_PARTY_CONTACT_GID = CONTACT.CONTACT_GID AND GTIP.INVOLVED_PARTY_QUAL_GID = 'CARRIER' AND GTIP.GTM_TRANSACTION_GID = :P_GTM_CUSTOMS_ID UNION SELECT GTIP.INVOLVED_PARTY_QUAL_GID INVOLVED_PARTY_QUAL_GID, INVOLVED_PARTY_CONTACT_GID, CONTACT_XID, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, PHONE1, PHONE2, FAX, MIDDLE_NAME, CELL_PHONE, ALTERNATE_NAME, COMPANY_NAME, LOCATION.LOCATION_GID LOCATION_GID, LOCATION_XID, LOCATION_NAME, CITY, PROVINCE, PROVINCE_CODE, POSTAL_CODE, LOCATION.COUNTRY_CODE3_GID COUNTRY_CODE3_GID, COUNTRY_CODE3_XID, COUNTRY_CODE2,SERVPROV.SCAC_GID SCAC_GID, null, null, null, null, null,null,null,LA1.ADDRESS_LINE AS ADDLINE1,LA2.ADDRESS_LINE AS ADDLINE2 FROM GLOGOWNER.GTM_TRANSACTION_INVOLVED_PARTY GTIP, GLOGOWNER.CONTACT LEFT OUTER JOIN GLOGOWNER.LOCATION ON (CONTACT.LOCATION_GID = LOCATION.LOCATION_GID) LEFT OUTER JOIN GLOGOWNER.COUNTRY_CODE ON (LOCATION.COUNTRY_CODE3_GID = COUNTRY_CODE.COUNTRY_CODE3_GID) LEFT OUTER JOIN GLOGOWNER.SERVPROV ON (CONTACT.CONTACT_GID = SERVPROV.SERVPROV_GID) LEFT OUTER JOIN LOCATION_ADDRESS LA1 ON (LA1.LOCATION_GID=LOCATION.LOCATION_GID AND LA1.LINE_SEQUENCE='1') LEFT OUTER JOIN LOCATION_ADDRESS LA2 ON (LA2.LOCATION_GID=LOCATION.LOCATION_GID AND LA2.LINE_SEQUENCE='2') WHERE GTIP.INVOLVED_PARTY_CONTACT_GID = CONTACT.CONTACT_GID AND GTIP.INVOLVED_PARTY_QUAL_GID = 'SHIPPER' AND GTIP.GTM_TRANSACTION_GID = :P_GTM_CUSTOMS_ID
select is_hazardous from shipment &shipwhereclause
select gtm_trans_refnum_qual_gid,refnum_value from gtm_trans_refnum where gtm_transaction_gid=&selectgtmid
Select sum(refnum_value) AS QUANTITY_VALUE from s_ship_unit_refnum where s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_GID='SCOULAR.PIECE COUNT' AND s_ship_unit_gid =(select LINE_OBJECT_ID FROM GTM_TRANSACTION_LINE where gtm_transaction_line_gid=(select preceding_transaction_line_gid from gtm_transaction_line where gtm_transaction_gid=:P_GTM_CUSTOMS_ID AND ROWNUM=1))
SELECT LOCATION_REFNUM_VALUE AS SCHEDULE_D_CODE, (SELECT LOCATION_REFNUM_VALUE FROM LOCATION_REFNUM, LOCATION_REFNUM_QUAL WHERE LOCATION_REFNUM.LOCATION_REFNUM_QUAL_GID = LOCATION_REFNUM_QUAL.LOCATION_REFNUM_QUAL_GID AND LOCATION_REFNUM.LOCATION_GID = (SELECT PORT_OF_LOAD_LOCATION_GID from shipment where SHIPMENT_GID=(SELECT shipment_gid from shipment where shipment_gid =(select object_id from gtm_transaction where gtm_transaction_gid=(select gtm_transaction_gid from gtm_transaction_line where gtm_transaction_line_gid=(select preceding_transaction_line_gid from gtm_transaction_line where gtm_transaction_gid=:P_GTM_CUSTOMS_ID AND ROWNUM=1)))) AND LOCATION_REFNUM_QUAL.LOCATION_REFNUM_QUAL_XID = 'SCHEDULE_K')) SCHEDULE_K_CODE FROM LOCATION_REFNUM, LOCATION_REFNUM_QUAL WHERE LOCATION_REFNUM.LOCATION_REFNUM_QUAL_GID = LOCATION_REFNUM_QUAL.LOCATION_REFNUM_QUAL_GID AND LOCATION_REFNUM.LOCATION_GID = (SELECT dest_location_gid from shipment where shipment_gid = &selectshipid) AND LOCATION_REFNUM_QUAL.LOCATION_REFNUM_QUAL_XID = 'SCHEDULE_D'
SELECT CITY || ',' || COUNTRY_NAME as location_id FROM LOCATION LO left join country_code cc on CC.COUNTRY_CODE3_GID=LO.COUNTRY_CODE3_GID WHERE LOCATION_XID=(SELECT SHIPMENT_REFNUM_VALUE FROM SHIPMENT_REFNUM SR where SHIPMENT_REFNUM_QUAL_GID='SCOULAR/NVO.PLACE OF RECEIPT' and shipment_gid =(select object_id from gtm_transaction where gtm_transaction_gid=(select gtm_transaction_gid from gtm_transaction_line where gtm_transaction_line_gid=(select preceding_transaction_line_gid from gtm_transaction_line where gtm_transaction_gid=:P_GTM_CUSTOMS_ID and rownum=1))))
select location_refnum_value AS SCHEDULE_K from location_refnum where location_gid = (select location_gid from location where location_xid=(select charter_voyage_refnum_value from charter_voyage_refnum where charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid='SCOULAR/NVO.VIA_LOCATION_ID' AND charter_voyage_gid=(select charter_voyage_gid from charter_voyage where CHARTER_VOYAGE_XID=(select refnum_value from gtm_trans_refnum where gtm_transaction_gid=:P_GTM_CUSTOMS_ID AND GTM_TRANS_REFNUM_QUAL_GID='TRANSPORTATION REFERENCE NUMBER')))) and location_refnum_qual_gid='SCHEDULE_K'
select location_refnum_value AS SCHEDULE_K from location_refnum where location_gid=(select source_location_gid from charter_voyage where CHARTER_VOYAGE_XID=(select refnum_value from gtm_trans_refnum where gtm_transaction_gid=:P_GTM_CUSTOMS_ID AND GTM_TRANS_REFNUM_QUAL_GID='TRANSPORTATION REFERENCE NUMBER')) and location_refnum_qual_gid='SCHEDULE_K'
select SHIPMENT_REFNUM_QUAL_GID,SHIPMENT_REFNUM_VALUE from SHIPMENT_REFNUM &shipwhereclause
select AMS_INT_CONTROL.NEXTVAL as INTNUM,AMS_TRAN_CONTROL.NEXTVAL AS TRANNUM FROM DUAL
select SCAC_GID FROM SERVPROV SVP WHERE SVP.SERVPROV_GID=(SELECT SERVPROV_GID FROM SHIPMENT where SHIPMENT_GID=(SELECT shipment_gid from shipment where shipment_gid =(select object_id from gtm_transaction where gtm_transaction_gid=(select gtm_transaction_gid from gtm_transaction_line where gtm_transaction_line_gid=(select preceding_transaction_line_gid from gtm_transaction_line where gtm_transaction_gid=:P_GTM_CUSTOMS_ID and rownum=1)))))
-->
select SHIPMENT_REFNUM_QUAL_GID,SHIPMENT_REFNUM_VALUE from SHIPMENT_REFNUM where SHIPMENT_GID=(SELECT shipment_gid from shipment where shipment_gid =(select object_id from gtm_transaction where gtm_transaction_gid=(select gtm_transaction_gid from gtm_transaction_line where gtm_transaction_line_gid=(select preceding_transaction_line_gid from gtm_transaction_line where gtm_transaction_gid=:P_GTM_CUSTOMS_ID and rownum=1))))
SELECT LOCATION_REFNUM_VALUE FROM LOCATION_REFNUM WHERE LOCATION_GID=(SELECT INVOLVED_PARTY_CONTACT_GID FROM SHIPMENT_INVOLVED_PARTY SIP where SIP.SHIPMENT_GID=(SELECT shipment_gid from shipment where shipment_gid =(select object_id from gtm_transaction where gtm_transaction_gid=(select gtm_transaction_gid from gtm_transaction_line where gtm_transaction_line_gid=(select preceding_transaction_line_gid from gtm_transaction_line where gtm_transaction_gid=:P_GTM_CUSTOMS_ID and rownum=1)))) AND INVOLVED_PARTY_QUAL_GID='SCOULAR.ALSO.NOTIFY') AND LOCATION_REFNUM_QUAL_GID='SCOULAR.FIRMS'
select JOB_XID,ATTRIBUTE5,ATTRIBUTE9,ATTRIBUTE13 from JOB WHERE JOB_GID=(SELECT SHIPMENT_REFNUM_VALUE from SHIPMENT_REFNUM where shipment_gid =(select object_id from gtm_transaction where gtm_transaction_gid=(select gtm_transaction_gid from gtm_transaction_line where gtm_transaction_line_gid=(select preceding_transaction_line_gid from gtm_transaction_line where gtm_transaction_gid=:P_GTM_CUSTOMS_ID and rownum=1))) AND SHIPMENT_REFNUM_QUAL_GID='SCOULAR.JOB_ID')
select JOB_REFNUM_QUAL_GID,JOB_REFNUM_VALUE from JOB_REFNUM JR WHERE JR.JOB_GID=(SELECT JOB_GID FROM JOB WHERE JOB_XID=(SELECT SHIPMENT_REFNUM_VALUE from SHIPMENT_REFNUM where shipment_gid =(select object_id from gtm_transaction where gtm_transaction_gid=(select gtm_transaction_gid from gtm_transaction_line where gtm_transaction_line_gid=(select preceding_transaction_line_gid from gtm_transaction_line where gtm_transaction_gid=:P_GTM_CUSTOMS_ID and rownum=1))) AND SHIPMENT_REFNUM_QUAL_GID='SCOULAR.JOB_ID'))
SELECT RTRIM(CHARTER_VOYAGE.VOYAGE_NAME) AS VOYAGE_NAME,TO_CHAR(CHARTER_VOYAGE.ARRIVAL_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') AS ESTIMATED_ARRIVAL_DATE FROM CHARTER_VOYAGE WHERE CHARTER_VOYAGE_XID=(SELECT REFNUM_VALUE FROM GTM_TRANS_REFNUM WHERE GTM_TRANSACTION_GID=:P_GTM_CUSTOMS_ID AND GTM_TRANS_REFNUM_QUAL_GID='TRANSPORTATION REFERENCE NUMBER' )
SELECT TO_CHAR(TRANSACTION_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') AS ESTIMATED_ARRIVAL_DATE FROM GTM_TRANSACTION_DATE WHERE GTM_TRANSACTION_GID=:P_GTM_CUSTOMS_ID AND DATE_QUALIFIER_GID='SCHEDULED_ARRIVAL_DATE'
Select vessel_name as VOYAGE_NAME,imo_number AS VESSEL_CODE,country_code2 AS VESSEL_FLAG, (select TO_CHAR(CHARTER_VOYAGE.ARRIVAL_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') FROM CHARTER_VOYAGE WHERE CHARTER_VOYAGE_XID=(SELECT REFNUM_VALUE FROM GTM_TRANS_REFNUM WHERE GTM_TRANSACTION_GID=:P_GTM_CUSTOMS_ID AND GTM_TRANS_REFNUM_QUAL_GID='TRANSPORTATION REFERENCE NUMBER' )) AS ESTIMATED_ARRIVAL_DATE from vessel join country_code on country_code3_gid=flag_country_code_gid where vessel_gid=(SELECT RTRIM(CHARTER_VOYAGE.VESSEL_GID) FROM CHARTER_VOYAGE WHERE CHARTER_VOYAGE_XID=(SELECT REFNUM_VALUE FROM GTM_TRANS_REFNUM WHERE GTM_TRANSACTION_GID=:P_GTM_CUSTOMS_ID AND GTM_TRANS_REFNUM_QUAL_GID='TRANSPORTATION REFERENCE NUMBER'))
Select CHARTER_VOYAGE_REFNUM_VALUE AS VOYAGE_NUMBER from gtm_trans_refnum JOIN CHARTER_VOYAGE CV ON REFNUM_VALUE=CHARTER_VOYAGE_XID JOIN CHARTER_VOYAGE_REFNUM CVR ON CVR.CHARTER_VOYAGE_GID=CV.CHARTER_VOYAGE_GID where gtm_transaction_gid=:P_GTM_CUSTOMS_ID --ND GTM_TRANS_REFNUM_QUAL_GID='CHARTER VOYAGE' AND CHARTER_VOYAGE_REFNUM_QUAL_GID='SCOULAR.CHARVOY_VOYAGE_NUMBER'
Select CHARTER_VOYAGE_REFNUM_VALUE AS BL_TYPE from gtm_trans_refnum JOIN CHARTER_VOYAGE CV ON REFNUM_VALUE=CHARTER_VOYAGE_XID JOIN CHARTER_VOYAGE_REFNUM CVR ON CVR.CHARTER_VOYAGE_GID=CV.CHARTER_VOYAGE_GID where gtm_transaction_gid=:P_GTM_CUSTOMS_ID AND CHARTER_VOYAGE_REFNUM_QUAL_GID='SCOULAR.BILL OF LADING TYPE'
select REFNUM_VALUE,GTM_TRANS_REFNUM_QUAL_GID from gtm_trans_refnum where gtm_transaction_gid=:P_GTM_CUSTOMS_ID
select LOCATION_REFNUM_QUAL_GID,LOCATION_REFNUM_VALUE from LOCATION_REFNUM where LOCATION_GID=(SELECT LOCATION_GID FROM LOCATION WHERE LOCATION_XID=(select REFNUM_VALUE from gtm_trans_refnum where gtm_transaction_gid=:P_GTM_CUSTOMS_ID AND GTM_TRANS_REFNUM_QUAL_GID='SCOULAR/NVO.VIA_LOCATION_ID' ))
Select Case STATUS_VALUE_GID WHEN 'SCOULAR/NVO.AMS_FILE_NEW' THEN 'W' WHEN 'SCOULAR/NVO.AMS_REVISED' THEN 'J' WHEN 'SCOULAR/NVO.AMS_CANCEL' THEN 'J' ELSE '' END AS MANIFEST_TYPE_CODE from GTM_TRANSACTION_STATUS where gtm_transaction_gid=:P_GTM_CUSTOMS_ID AND STATUS_TYPE_GID='SCOULAR/NVO.AMS_FILE_STATUS'
Select GTM_QUANTITY_TYPE_GID,QUANTITY_VALUE,UOM_CODE from GTM_TRANSACTION_QUANTITY where GTM_QUANTITY_TYPE_GID IN('TOTAL GROSS WEIGHT','TOTAL GROSS VOLUME') AND GTM_TRANSACTION_GID=:P_GTM_CUSTOMS_ID
Select LOCATION_REFNUM_VALUE,LOCATION_REFNUM_QUAL_GID FROM location_refnum WHERE location_gid=(SELECT gtm_transaction_port.location_gid FROM GTM_TRANSACTION_PORT where GTM_PORT_QUALIFIER_GID IN('PORT OF EXPORT') AND GTM_TRANSACTION_GID=:P_GTM_CUSTOMS_ID)
SELECT REMARK_TEXT FROM GTM_TRANSACTION_REMARK WHERE GTM_TRANSACTION_GID=:P_GTM_CUSTOMS_ID AND REMARK_QUAL_GID='SCOULAR.FILING.UOM'
select STATUS_VALUE_GID from GTM_TRANSACTION_STATUS where gtm_transaction_gid=:P_GTM_CUSTOMS_ID AND STATUS_TYPE_GID='SCOULAR/NVO.AMS_FILE_STATUS'
select QUOTE_REFNUM_VALUE from QUOTE_REFNUM QR WHERE QR.QUOTE_GID= (SELECT RO.QUOTE_GID FROM ORDER_RELEASE RO WHERE RO.ORDER_RELEASE_GID=(SELECT ORDER_RELEASE_GID from VIEW_SHIPMENT_ORDER_RELEASE WHERE SHIPMENT_GID=(SELECT shipment_gid from shipment where shipment_gid =(select object_id from gtm_transaction where gtm_transaction_gid=(select gtm_transaction_gid from gtm_transaction_line where gtm_transaction_line_gid=(select preceding_transaction_line_gid from gtm_transaction_line where gtm_transaction_gid=:P_GTM_CUSTOMS_ID and rownum=1)))) and rownum=1)) AND QUOTE_REFNUM_QUAL_GID='SCOULAR.PLACE OF RECEIPT'
SELECT GTIP.INVOLVED_PARTY_QUAL_GID INVOLVED_PARTY_QUAL_GID, INVOLVED_PARTY_CONTACT_GID, CONTACT_XID, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, PHONE1, PHONE2, FAX, MIDDLE_NAME, CELL_PHONE, ALTERNATE_NAME, COMPANY_NAME, LOCATION.LOCATION_GID LOCATION_GID, LOCATION_XID, LOCATION_NAME, CITY, PROVINCE, PROVINCE_CODE, POSTAL_CODE, LOCATION.COUNTRY_CODE3_GID COUNTRY_CODE3_GID, COUNTRY_CODE3_XID, COUNTRY_CODE2,SERVPROV.SCAC_GID SCAC_GID, null, null, null, null, null,null,null,LA1.ADDRESS_LINE AS ADDLINE1,LA2.ADDRESS_LINE AS ADDLINE2 FROM GLOGOWNER.GTM_TRANSACTION_INVOLVED_PARTY GTIP, GLOGOWNER.CONTACT LEFT OUTER JOIN GLOGOWNER.LOCATION ON (CONTACT.LOCATION_GID = LOCATION.LOCATION_GID) LEFT OUTER JOIN GLOGOWNER.COUNTRY_CODE ON (LOCATION.COUNTRY_CODE3_GID = COUNTRY_CODE.COUNTRY_CODE3_GID) LEFT OUTER JOIN GLOGOWNER.SERVPROV ON (CONTACT.CONTACT_GID = SERVPROV.SERVPROV_GID) LEFT OUTER JOIN LOCATION_ADDRESS LA1 ON (LA1.LOCATION_GID=LOCATION.LOCATION_GID AND LA1.LINE_SEQUENCE='1') LEFT OUTER JOIN LOCATION_ADDRESS LA2 ON (LA2.LOCATION_GID=LOCATION.LOCATION_GID AND LA2.LINE_SEQUENCE='2') WHERE GTIP.INVOLVED_PARTY_CONTACT_GID = CONTACT.CONTACT_GID AND GTIP.INVOLVED_PARTY_QUAL_GID in ('SHIPPER','CONSIGNEE') AND GTIP.GTM_TRANSACTION_GID = :P_GTM_CUSTOMS_ID
select tag_1 AS SEAL1,tag_3 AS EQUIP_ID,su.Received_SHIP_UNIT_COUNT AS EQUIP_LEN,su2.refnum_value as SEAL2,su3.refnum_value as SEAL3,su4.refnum_value as unit_code from shipment_stop_d ssd join s_ship_unit su on su.S_SHIP_UNIT_GID=ssd.S_SHIP_UNIT_GID LEFT join s_ship_unit_refnum su2 on su2.S_SHIP_UNIT_GID=ssd.S_SHIP_UNIT_GID and SU2.S_SHIP_UNIT_REFNUM_QUAL_GID='SCOULAR.CONTAINER SEAL NUMBER 2' LEFT join s_ship_unit_refnum su3 on su3.S_SHIP_UNIT_GID=ssd.S_SHIP_UNIT_GID and SU3.S_SHIP_UNIT_REFNUM_QUAL_GID='SCOULAR.CONTAINER SEAL NUMBER 3' LEFT join s_ship_unit_refnum su4 on su4.S_SHIP_UNIT_GID=ssd.S_SHIP_UNIT_GID and SU4.S_SHIP_UNIT_REFNUM_QUAL_GID='SCOULAR/NVO.MANIFEST UNIT CODE' &shipwhereclause and stop_num=1
Select su.S_SHIP_UNIT_GID,line_object_id,sur.S_SHIP_UNIT_REFNUM_QUAL_GID,sur.REFNUM_VALUE as MARKS_NUM,SUR2.REFNUM_VALUE AS FF_DESC,su4.refnum_value as unit_code,tag_3 AS EQUIP_ID, tag_1 AS SEAL1,tag_3 AS EQUIP_ID,su.Received_SHIP_UNIT_COUNT AS EQUIP_LEN,su2.refnum_value as SEAL2,su3.refnum_value as SEAL3,su4.refnum_value as unit_code, (SELECT GTR1.QUANTITY_VALUE FROM GTM_TRANS_LINE_QUANTITY GTR1 WHERE GTR1.GTM_TRANSACTION_LINE_GID=GTL.GTM_TRANSACTION_LINE_GID AND GTR1.GTM_QUANTITY_TYPE_GID ='TOTAL GROSS WEIGHT') as WEIGHT, (SELECT GTR1.UOM_CODE FROM GTM_TRANS_LINE_QUANTITY GTR1 WHERE GTR1.GTM_TRANSACTION_LINE_GID=GTL.GTM_TRANSACTION_LINE_GID AND GTR1.GTM_QUANTITY_TYPE_GID ='TOTAL GROSS WEIGHT') as WEIGHT_UNIT_CODE, (SELECT round(GTR1.CURRENCY_VALUE,0) FROM GTM_TRANS_LINE_CURRENCY GTR1 WHERE GTR1.GTM_TRANSACTION_LINE_GID=GTL.GTM_TRANSACTION_LINE_GID AND GTR1.GTM_CURRENCY_TYPE_GID ='TOTAL VALUE') AS LINE_VALUE, (Select refnum_value from s_ship_unit_refnum where s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_GID='SCOULAR.PIECE COUNT' AND s_ship_unit_gid =(select LINE_OBJECT_ID FROM GTM_TRANSACTION_LINE where gtm_transaction_line_gid=(select preceding_transaction_line_gid from gtm_transaction_line where gtm_transaction_gid=:P_GTM_CUSTOMS_ID AND ROWNUM=1))) AS LINE_QTY, (Select refnum_value from s_ship_unit_refnum where s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_GID='SCOULAR.PIECE TYPE' AND s_ship_unit_gid =(select LINE_OBJECT_ID FROM GTM_TRANSACTION_LINE where gtm_transaction_line_gid=(select preceding_transaction_line_gid from gtm_transaction_line where gtm_transaction_gid=:P_GTM_CUSTOMS_ID AND ROWNUM=1))) AS LINE_UOM, CLASSIFICATION_CODE AS CLASS_CODE,gtl.gtm_transaction_gid from shipment_stop_d ssd LEFT join s_ship_unit su on su.S_SHIP_UNIT_GID=ssd.S_SHIP_UNIT_GID LEFT JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum sur on sur.S_SHIP_UNIT_GID=ssd.S_SHIP_UNIT_GID and sur.S_SHIP_UNIT_REFNUM_QUAL_GID='SCOULAR.MARKS AND NUMBERS' LEFT JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum sur2 on sur2.S_SHIP_UNIT_GID=ssd.S_SHIP_UNIT_GID and sur2.S_SHIP_UNIT_REFNUM_QUAL_GID='SCOULAR.COMMODITY ID' LEFT join s_ship_unit_refnum su4 on su4.S_SHIP_UNIT_GID=ssd.S_SHIP_UNIT_GID and SU4.S_SHIP_UNIT_REFNUM_QUAL_GID='SCOULAR/NVO.MANIFEST UNIT CODE' LEFT join s_ship_unit_refnum su2 on su2.S_SHIP_UNIT_GID=ssd.S_SHIP_UNIT_GID and SU2.S_SHIP_UNIT_REFNUM_QUAL_GID='SCOULAR.CONTAINER SEAL NUMBER 2' LEFT join s_ship_unit_refnum su3 on su3.S_SHIP_UNIT_GID=ssd.S_SHIP_UNIT_GID and SU3.S_SHIP_UNIT_REFNUM_QUAL_GID='SCOULAR.CONTAINER SEAL NUMBER 3' LEFT join gtm_transaction_line gtl on gtl.line_object_id=su.S_SHIP_UNIT_GID LEFT JOIN GTM_TR_PROD_CLASSIFICATION GTP ON GTP.GTM_TRANSACTION_LINE_GID=GTL.GTM_TRANSACTION_LINE_GID LEFT JOIN GTM_PROD_CLASS_CODE GPC ON GPC.GTM_PROD_CLASS_CODE_GID=GTP.GTM_PROD_CLASS_CODE_GID &shipwhereclause and stop_num=1 and gtl.gtm_transaction_gid=:P_GTM_CUSTOMS_ID
select tag_1 AS SEAL1,tag_3 AS EQUIP_ID,Received_SHIP_UNIT_COUNT AS EQUIP_LEN,su2.refnum_value as SEAL2,su3.refnum_value as SEAL3,su4.refnum_value as unit_code, (SELECT GTR1.QUANTITY_VALUE FROM GTM_TRANS_LINE_REPORT_QUANTITY GTR1 WHERE GTR1.GTM_TRANSACTION_LINE_GID=GTL.GTM_TRANSACTION_LINE_GID AND GTR1.GTM_PROD_CLASS_TYPE_GID='HTS US' AND GTR1.GTM_QUANTITY_TYPE_GID ='TOTAL GROSS WEIGHT') as WEIGHT, (SELECT GTR1.UOM_CODE FROM GTM_TRANS_LINE_REPORT_QUANTITY GTR1 WHERE GTR1.GTM_TRANSACTION_LINE_GID=GTL.GTM_TRANSACTION_LINE_GID AND GTR1.GTM_PROD_CLASS_TYPE_GID='HTS US' AND GTR1.GTM_QUANTITY_TYPE_GID ='TOTAL GROSS WEIGHT') as WEIGHT_UNIT_CODE, (SELECT round(GTR1.CURRENCY_VALUE,0) FROM GTM_TRANS_LINE_CURRENCY GTR1 WHERE GTR1.GTM_TRANSACTION_LINE_GID=GTL.GTM_TRANSACTION_LINE_GID AND GTR1.GTM_CURRENCY_TYPE_GID ='TOTAL VALUE') AS LINE_VALUE, (SELECT GTR2.QUANTITY_VALUE FROM GTM_TRANS_LINE_QUANTITY GTR2 WHERE GTR2.GTM_TRANSACTION_LINE_GID = GTL.GTM_TRANSACTION_LINE_GID AND GTR2.GTM_QUANTITY_TYPE_GID = 'SCOULAR/NVO.PIECE COUNT') AS LINE_QTY, (SELECT GTR3.UOM_CODE FROM GTM_TRANS_LINE_QUANTITY GTR3 WHERE GTR3.GTM_TRANSACTION_LINE_GID = GTL.GTM_TRANSACTION_LINE_GID AND GTR3.GTM_QUANTITY_TYPE_GID = 'SCOULAR/NVO.PIECE COUNT') AS LINE_UOM, gtl.line_object_id,CLASSIFICATION_CODE AS CLASS_CODE from shipment_stop_d ssd join s_ship_unit su on su.S_SHIP_UNIT_GID=ssd.S_SHIP_UNIT_GID LEFT join s_ship_unit_refnum su2 on su2.S_SHIP_UNIT_GID=ssd.S_SHIP_UNIT_GID and SU2.S_SHIP_UNIT_REFNUM_QUAL_GID='SCOULAR.CONTAINER SEAL NUMBER 2' LEFT join s_ship_unit_refnum su3 on su3.S_SHIP_UNIT_GID=ssd.S_SHIP_UNIT_GID and SU3.S_SHIP_UNIT_REFNUM_QUAL_GID='SCOULAR.CONTAINER SEAL NUMBER 3' LEFT join s_ship_unit_refnum su4 on su4.S_SHIP_UNIT_GID=ssd.S_SHIP_UNIT_GID and SU4.S_SHIP_UNIT_REFNUM_QUAL_GID='SCOULAR/NVO.MANIFEST UNIT CODE' left join gtm_transaction_line gtl on gtl.line_object_id=su.S_SHIP_UNIT_GID LEFT JOIN GTM_TR_PROD_CLASSIFICATION GTP ON GTP.GTM_TRANSACTION_LINE_GID=GTL.GTM_TRANSACTION_LINE_GID LEFT JOIN GTM_PROD_CLASS_CODE GPC ON GPC.GTM_PROD_CLASS_CODE_GID=GTP.GTM_PROD_CLASS_CODE_GID &shipwhereclause and stop_num=1 and gtl.gtm_transaction_gid=:P_GTM_CUSTOMS_ID
SELECT GTR.REFNUM_VALUE AS VIN FROM GTM_TRANSACTION GT LEFT JOIN GTM_TRANSACTION_LINE GTL ON GTL.GTM_TRANSACTION_GID=GT.GTM_TRANSACTION_GID LEFT JOIN GTM_TRANSLINE_REFNUM GTR ON GTR.GTM_TRANSACTION_LINE_GID=GTL.GTM_TRANSACTION_LINE_GID WHERE GT.GTM_TRANSACTION_GID=:P_GTM_CUSTOMS_ID AND GTM_TRANSLINE_REFNUM_QUAL_GID='VEHICLE IDENTIFICATION NUMBER'
SELECT SU.REFNUM_VALUE as UN_NUM ,SU2.REFNUM_VALUE AS PACK_GROUP,SU3.REFNUM_VALUE AS CLASS,SU4.REFNUM_VALUE AS CONTACT from shipment_stop_d ssd LEFT join s_ship_unit_refnum su on su.S_SHIP_UNIT_GID=ssd.S_SHIP_UNIT_GID LEFT join s_ship_unit_refnum su2 on su2.S_SHIP_UNIT_GID=ssd.S_SHIP_UNIT_GID and su2.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid ='SCOULAR.HAZMAT PACKING GROUP' LEFT join s_ship_unit_refnum su3 on su3.S_SHIP_UNIT_GID=ssd.S_SHIP_UNIT_GID and su3.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid ='SCOULAR.HAZMAT CLASS' LEFT join s_ship_unit_refnum su4 on su4.S_SHIP_UNIT_GID=ssd.S_SHIP_UNIT_GID and su4.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid ='SCOULAR.HAZMAT CONTACT NAME NUMBER' &shipwhereclause and stop_num=1 and SU.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid ='SCOULAR.HAZMAT UN NUMBER'
